trans-unit.source: Represents a light source that has a specified position in space and projects its light in all directions.
trans-unit.target: 表示具有空间中的指定的位置并投射其所有方向 light 光源。

trans-unit.source: The rate at which the light's intensity diminishes over distance is called its attenuation and can be controlled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.ConstantAttenuation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.LinearAttenuation%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.QuadraticAttenuation%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 显示光亮度随距离的速率称为其衰减，可以通过设置控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.ConstantAttenuation%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.LinearAttenuation%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.QuadraticAttenuation%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.QuadraticAttenuation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.LinearAttenuation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.ConstantAttenuation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight"></xref> class at the origin.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight"></xref>原点的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight"></xref> class at the specified position, using the specified color.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight"></xref>中指定的位置，使用指定的颜色的类。

trans-unit.source: The diffuse color.
trans-unit.target: 漫射的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The position.
trans-unit.target: 位置。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
